Polyuria often appears in conjunction with polydipsia (increased thirst), though
it is possible to have one without the other, and the latter may be a cause or
an effect. Psychogenic polydipsia may lead to polyuria.

Polyuria is physiologically normal in some circumstances, such as cold ,
altitude diuresis, and after drinking large amounts of fluids.
